00011         public static SizeF Invert(this SizeF size)
00012         {
00013             if (size.Width == 0 || size.Height == 0)
00014                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("size", size, "size must not have zero width or height");
00015             var width = 1.0f / size.Width;
00016             var height = 1.0f / size.Height;
00017 
00018             return new SizeF(width, height);
00019         }

00022         {
00023             if (size.Width == 0 || size.Height == 0)
00024                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("size", size, "size must not have zero width or height");
00025             var width = 1.0f / size.Width;
00026             var height = 1.0f / size.Height;

00028             return new SizeF(width, height);

00056         {

00063         public static Size Ceiling(this SizeF size)
00064         {

00066             var height = (int)Math.Ceiling(size.Height);
00067 
00068             return new Size(width, height);
